metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4390 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
(1) apps/calendar/appinfo/remote.php and (2) apps/contacts/appinfo/remote.php in ownCloud before 4.0.7 allows remote authenticated users to enumerate the registered users via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4390` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> owncloud packages in Ubuntu are now empty

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1').
